item.title: Redknee Announces Shareholder Approval of Private Placement
item.description: [PR Newswire] - TORONTO, Jan. 25, 2017 /CNW/ - Redknee Solutions Inc. (" Redknee " or the " Company ") (TSX: RKN) is pleased to announce that at the special meeting (" Meeting ") of holders ...
